page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5ws_LockOutUserSet(C UserValue [,* UntilTime [,* NotUsed ]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The lock out was set. .F. = The lock out was not set.

argument.name: UserValue
argument.description: A user value to be temporarily disabled.

argument.name: UntilTime
argument.description: Optional. Default = user is locked out indefinitely. A time value in the future, when the user ID will be enabled.

page.description: Web Security - Lockout the User Value until the set time / date. If 'UntilTime' is not entered, the User Value is locked out indefinitely until manually released
page.discussion: The A5WS_LockOutUserSet() function locks out a user value for a specified amount of time. Limitations: Web publishing applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example locks out the user with the user id of "joe@email.com" until Jan 1, 2007 at 10:00 pm.
section.example: dim ut as T ut = ctodt("01/01/2007 10:00:00 00 pm") a5ws_LockOutUserSet("joe@email.com", ut)

see.ref: Locks out a user value for a specified amount of time.
